des: "I came up with this because of my love for hotdogs. Chefs love dude food. This is a simple ratio or guideline. You can use whatever you want really, but this is just something I came up with and the ratio works well. It will keep at least a month in an airtight jar."
ins: Mix ketchup, Dijon mustard, sriracha sauce, and Japanese mayonnaise together in a small bowl or jar.
